The patient randomize 2 treatment group : The first group receive one ULTRACET® tablet 3 time per day 7 day . The second group receive one placebo tablet 3 time per day 7 day . The primary efficacy measurement patient ' average daily pain score . Safety monitor throughout study . The study hypothesis ULTRACET® well tolerate average daily pain relief score ULTRACET® treatment group well placebo group . Patients take one ULTRACET® tablet placebo mouth 3 time per day , 7 day .
